translation: Yylhi āftab vttnh yiyhi gash rvzys nh kynhh thi,
Byyhi yylhi tark gttụ̄ gczhn,
Byyhi yylhi koh pknavnh yin,
Byyhi yylhi bardar vvunttinhi yimn dah ryth ḥmls āsn gmtụ̄ prczhns tyar āsn travnh yin,
Byyhi yylhi jngy janvr sombrnh yin, jnglv mnzh yin sạry vsith,
Byyhi yylhi drya tavnh yin,
Byyhi yylhi rvḥ yin milnavnh bdnn sintụ̄,
Byyhi yylhi znde qbri mnz travnh āmczi kvri pirczhnh yiyhi,
Kamhi gnah āyhi so marnh?
Byyhi yylhi namh aʿmal yin mczravnh ya chhkravnh yin,
Byyhi yylhi āsmanch bsth valnh yiyhi,
Byyhi yylhi jhnm yiyhi tyz krnh,
Byyhi yylhi jnt yiyhi nkhh aannh,
Zaanhi tmhi saʿth prth akhah kya āshi tmụ̄ ḥạẓr kvrmut ʿmlv andrh.
Ps chhus bh qsm havan pvt pihyrith gczh vunyn tarkn hund,
Yim pkh vunụ̄ chih pnnyn mṭalʿn mnz ghạb gczhh vunụ̄ chhi,
Byyhi chhus qasm havan rạcz hund yylhi so phyrith gczuhn hyvan chhe,
Byyhi chhus qasm havan ṣubḥuk yylhi suh pholan chhu, (yim qasm chhus havan yth kthhi petth kh)
Be shk yhi qrāni mjyd chhu parvun akis svznh āmtis mlkh sund yus mrtbh kinụ̄ bvdd chhu khdays nishhi.
Qvth vvl chhu, ʿrshhi vạlis khdays nishhi chhu thdis ʿhds petth.
Mannh āmut chhu byyhi chhu tathi mʿtbr amant dar.
Byyhi chhunh tohyhi sintụ̄ hmyshh rvzn vvl ḥẓrt Muḥammad mvt th dyvanh.
Byyhi vuchh ḥẓrt Muḥammadn jbryl pnnhi aṣly shklhi mnz āsman kis ands petth yus nvn chhu.
Byyhi chhunh yhi pyghmbri brḥq ghyby kthn petth bkhl krvun.
Byyhi chhunh yhi qrāni mjyd mrdvd shyṭan snz kth.
Ps kvkun chhiv tvhụ̄ gczhan?
Yhi qrāni mjyd chhunh mgr nṣyḥt sarine ʿālmynn kicz.
Tohyhi andrh timn hndi khạṭrh yim syzi vathi pkun yczhn.
Tvhụ̄ hykiv nh yyczith mgre yyczihh Allah tʿālyā yus ʿālmynn hund rb chhu.
